column4: [nrx] , you should read http://catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html. What's your dns issue?
DNS seems to be broken. nslookup in console works fine, in firefox it doesn'.
im running apt-get from console. i was saying that in firefox, i.e. www.google.co.uk doesn't work. IP addresses work fine though. In console, nslookup can resolve perfectl, but apt-get can not
i don't have an nscd in /etc/init.d
i have connection problems in general. At the office, this laptop is fine. Here, at home, i've got all kinds of issues
